UniprotID	Q9BXS1
Accession	Q9BXS1
EntryName	IDI2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Isopentenyl-diphosphate delta-isomerase 2 (EC 5.3.3.2) (Isopentenyl pyrophosphate isomerase 2) (IPP isomerase 2) (IPPI2)
GeneName	IDI2
Length	227
Function	Catalyzes the 1,3-allylic rearrangement of the homoallylic substrate isopentenyl (IPP) to its highly electrophilic allylic isomer, dimethylallyl diphosphate (DMAPP).
Subcellular Location	Peroxisome
